visualizations.title: Actual vs Predicted Values
visualizations.description: Comparison of actual and predicted rice export quantities with 1:1 reference line

visualizations.title: Residual Distribution
visualizations.description: Histogram of prediction residuals (actual - predicted) with normal distribution overlay

insights: Model has high average error (MAE=171.68) and extreme percentage error (MAPE=19664.55%)
data.summary: The random forest model for predicting rice exports to Bangladesh shows unacceptable accuracy (MAPE >19,600%) and cannot be used for reliable forecasting. The model systematically underpredicts export quantities by an average of 106 units.
data.task_answer: The random forest model for predicting rice exports to Bangladesh shows unacceptable accuracy (MAPE >19,600%) and cannot be used for reliable forecasting. The model systematically underpredicts export quantities by an average of 106 units.
